name: Mint Ice Cream
author: Rafael
summary: Easiest, tastiest way to turn fresh mint into ice cream! This no-cook recipe preserves the raw mint's intensity.
ingredients: 4 cups fresh mint leaves, or to taste
directions: Blend mint, milk, sugar, vanilla, and salt together on high speed until the mint leaf bits are tiny, about 1 minute
Add heavy cream and blend until uniform, about 15 seconds
Pour mixture into an ice cream maker and freeze according to manufacturer's instructions, about 20 minutes, adding chocolate chips during the last 5 minutes
Transfer to an airtight container and freeze until firm, about 4 hours
